short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Endless TikTok videos are made accessible with eye gaze devices

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension makes TikTok accessible for people with physical disabilities, it allows them to watch and navigate videos on TikTok using an eye-tracking device such as Tobii (https://www.tobii.com/).
This extension makes the navigation and the "Like" buttons large and accessible.
On the settings page, you can set the color of the navigation buttons.
the location of the "Like" button, and the possibility of "Speech To Text" with which you can define what the voice will say while pressing the navigation and "Like" buttons.
